hit.headline: 'He Crab She Crab' Coastal Home with Beach, Bay &Backyard Fun.Perfect for Kids!

unitReview.title: Great family getaway
unitReview.snippet: This home was perfect for our family of five (mom, dad, grandparents and 10-month old). The home was simply beautiful and looked just as portrayed in the pictures here. We had everything we needed...
unitReview.text: This home was perfect for our family of five (mom, dad, grandparents and 10-month old). The home was simply beautiful and looked just as portrayed in the pictures here. We had everything we needed to vacation for a week with one very curious baby. Mark and Elaine were accommodating, providing us with all the baby gear as listed here. The kitchen is well stocked with all sorts of cooking and eating utensils and appliances. This place was a home away from home. Though it rained for 4 of the 7 days we were there, we were able to find much to do around the house (fishing, movies, games, crabbing, making quick runs to the beach, etc). We visited the Virginia Beach Aquarium and actually saw dolphins while walking on the beach one day! The She Crab soup at Margie and Rays is a must have!! All in all, a very relaxing, memorable vacation.

hit.headline: Architectural Ocean Front Gem on Widest most Private Beach in Virginia Beach

unitReview.title: Wonderful vacation home
unitReview.snippet: What a great house for a large family. Very comfortable and close to the beach. The owner is great and also available to help out. The beach is close and very nice. We saw dolphins very day. Good ...
unitReview.text: What a great house for a large family. Very comfortable and close to the beach. The owner is great and also available to help out. The beach is close and very nice. We saw dolphins very day. Good for birders. Eastern Towhees, Indigo Buntings, Carolina Wrens and Cardinals nest in the dunes next to the house and are not shy. Osprey are common and terns and pelicans were fishing off the beach every day. Quiet and relaxing. Lots to do in the area. Thank you Gayle!!

hit.headline: New, Upscale, Family-Friendly House only 2 Blocks to the Beach and Boardwalk.

unitReview.title: Perfect Spot for a Family Beach Vacation!
unitReview.snippet: My family and I just returned from a fabulous stay at Kathy's Beach Retreat! The house exceeded our expectations and was the perfect "homebase" for exploring Virginia Beach. There was ample room f...
unitReview.text: My family and I just returned from a fabulous stay at Kathy's Beach Retreat! The house exceeded our expectations and was the perfect "homebase" for exploring Virginia Beach. There was ample room for my family of 5 as well as my sister's family of 4. The bunk room was the favorite hangout spot for the little ones (age 2-5). The beach is just a quick walk across two busy streets and there are more than enough beach accessories at the house for the taking. The outdoor shower made it SO easy to clean up all the kiddos and gear when returning from a day at the beach! Harris Teeter grocery store is a few blocks away which made picking up the essentials very easy and convenient! If we ever find ourselves in the area again, we will definitely plan our stay around this house!

hit.headline: Sandbridge "Sea~Esta" - Family Friendly Beach House in North End of Sandbridge

unitReview.title: Can't say enough terrific things!
unitReview.snippet: We LOVED our month-long stay at Sea-Esta! The home was spotless, convenient to the beach and provided lots of flexible parking. It is clear that the owners have put a TON of thought into the thing...
unitReview.text: We LOVED our month-long stay at Sea-Esta! The home was spotless, convenient to the beach and provided lots of flexible parking. It is clear that the owners have put a TON of thought into the things they've put into the house -- no matter what we needed, it was available -- down to the corn cob holders! Lizette was a dream to work with. We've stayed in several Sandbridge homes, and the North End is the best. Every dollar we spent was well worth it! We'd recommend Sea-Esta in a heartbeat, and will stay with them again if we're ever in Sandbridge.

hit.headline: This Condo Is Located 5 Minutes From The Virgina Beach Board Walk And Beach

unitReview.title: Great place to stay, loved it!!!!
unitReview.snippet: I stayed at the Shell House for a week with my husband and 3 kids. Upon arrival the condo was clean and smelled wonderful. It is a 5 min walk to the beach. We felt perfectly safe in the area, even...
unitReview.text: I stayed at the Shell House for a week with my husband and 3 kids. Upon arrival the condo was clean and smelled wonderful. It is a 5 min walk to the beach. We felt perfectly safe in the area, even though it is alittle busier on weekends, you didnt hear traffic or noise from people walking to the pier or beach. Russell is very quick to respond to all questions and you can see the effort that was put into the condo to make families feel comfortable. There were beach chairs, umbrella and boogie boards for the kids to use as well. Its the perfect place to stay and the next time we visit the beach I will be staying there! Thank you for a great stay!!!

unitReview.snippet: We loved everything the Pineapple Lanai has to offer!! The home is lovely, spacious, beautifully kept and great for family fun and entertaining. The back yard tiki bar, access and beautiful views ...
unitReview.text: We loved everything the Pineapple Lanai has to offer!! The home is lovely, spacious, beautifully kept and great for family fun and entertaining. The back yard tiki bar, access and beautiful views of the canal and added bonus of standing paddle boards offered even more enjoyment than we expected!! An easy walk to the beach makes this home absolutely perfect for a vacation filled with fun and relaxation... with the added bonus of a personal gym! Thank you Bill and Anne for being such gracious hosts... we really enjoyed meeting you both and can't wait to come back next year!!

hit.headline: Cottage on Back Bay Wild Life Refuge at Sandbridge Beach-7 day Sat check-in only

unitReview.title: Stunning Location and Relaxing Pool Nearby
unitReview.snippet: The location was absolutely beautiful and relaxing! Sitting right on the bay was magical and we enjoyed dinner and lounging on the deck overlooking the bay. We also loved having a pool right acros...
unitReview.text:
The location was absolutely beautiful and relaxing! Sitting right on the bay was magical and we enjoyed dinner and lounging on the deck overlooking the bay. We also loved having a pool right across from us to lounge in during the 100 degree days of summer! And when we wanted beach access, it was only two blocks across the main street. We couldn't have asked for a better location. We loved being at Sandbridge as it was quieter and much less commercialized than downtown Virginia Beach, but it was close enough that we didn't have to drive far to find things to do in the city. We highly recommend visiting the Virginia Aquarium & Marine Science Center. Great for kids and adults! Just don't go on a holiday like we did (July 4). It was packed!
Paul was a great renter and host. If we had a problem (which only happened once...we got locked out of the rental), he was on top of it and fixed it quickly. He communicated constantly with us before our rental time to make sure we had what we needed and more.
Paul also gave great restaurant recommendations that we took advantage of. We highly recommend Blue Pete's, Margie & Ray's, and Baha. All are local and delicious. We also loved having several local farm stands in the area with tons of fresh produce, baked goods, fresh herbs & greens, and seafood. Made cooking dinners a breeze.
Our only difficulty was that the bathroom in the rental is not quite made for big people (welcome to RV living!). It was a challenge at times! But we also had a bathroom and nice shower across the way near the pool if we desired more space at any time. So it really wasn't a problem. Additionally, the bath house had laundry facilities so you could take advantage of not dragging home a ton of dirty laundry. Otherwise, the rental was well maintained and very clean. Nice size kitchen and living room, and a queen size bed in the bedroom which was comfortable.
We'll definitely be back!

hit.description: Vacation in a tranquil setting on beautiful Back Bay. View incredible sunsets from your back yard after a day of swimming and fishing in the fresh water of Back Bay or after a day of surf and sand on the beach. Play tennis at our clubhouse, swim...

hit.headline: LAST MINUTE VACATION?

unitReview.title: Property was very nice, clean and in a great location
unitReview.snippet: We really enjoyed staying at Robb's house. It was in a nice neighborhood, short walk to the beach, not in the middle of the touristy mayhem of VA beach yet close enough to enjoy the restaurants / ...
unitReview.text:
We really enjoyed staying at Robb's house. It was in a nice neighborhood, short walk to the beach, not in the middle of the touristy mayhem of VA beach yet close enough to enjoy the restaurants / activities when we wanted. The house itself was great for our families, with quality furnishings, and it was nice to have beach toys and chairs / boogie boards we could take to the beach.
Our only minor complaint is the lack of basic cleaning supplies (toilet paper, trash bags, dishwasher detergent) and kitchen supplies (salt/pepper, oil, etc) - we had to buy all that stuff because there was not enough for our group of 8 for the week. Our experience in other vacation / short stay rentals is for those items to be provided.
Overall, though, we had a great time and would wholeheartedly recommend the property.

hit.headline: Ocean View Luxury Penthouse Style Condo, Top Floor

unitReview.title: Excellent!!!!
unitReview.snippet: We had an excellent visit to Virginia Beach. Perfect place to stay; beautiful condo, well equipped, very clean, well maintained , nicely decorated and extremely comfortable!. The location is amaz...
unitReview.text: We had an excellent visit to Virginia Beach. Perfect place to stay; beautiful condo, well equipped, very clean, well maintained , nicely decorated and extremely comfortable!. The location is amazing, 1 block from the beach and the Boardwalk (with all the main amenities a minute away and still a peaceful place without the crowds). There is a very nice grocery store right across the street. You can literally park your car and forget about it for as long as you stay, everything you need is at walking distance; It's a ten minute drive from the aquarium and the Adventure Park. I highly recommend this apartment for staying in Virginia beach and we would stay in this apartment again.

hit.headline: Resort/Beach/Boardwalk Area, 3 blocks to the Beach

unitReview.title: Great Week in an awesome home!
unitReview.snippet: Stayed here 7/16/16 - 7/23/16 and really thought the home was spot on. The owner had pretty much everything you needed, including a very convenient cart to roll your belongings to the beach. Outsi...
unitReview.text:
Stayed here 7/16/16 - 7/23/16 and really thought the home was spot on. The owner had pretty much everything you needed, including a very convenient cart to roll your belongings to the beach. Outside patio was very nice, and being able to park your car(2) inside the gate is a nice touch. Unfortunately it was so hot the week we were there couldn't take advantage of sitting outside very often.
Inside was beautiful with hardwood floors, nice living and dining area, and a very modern kitchen with all the appliances you need. Master Bedroom and Master Bath were really nice, along with the 2nd bedroom. We had 5 people here so my son ended up sleeping on the air mattress which was no big deal.... A little bit of a hike to the beach, which was one of the nicer beaches I've been to on the East Coast. There is a Dairy Queen right before you go on the beach where you can buy ice for those adult beverages......
Overall I would highly recommend this property, and Susan got right back to me when I had any questions. Enjoy your stay!

hit.headline: "The Rimini" Luxury At The Beach-Home Away From Home!

unitReview.title: It was better than the picture.
unitReview.snippet: We stayed at the Torino. It was better than the picture. Lots of space, close to everything. One block away from the stores. even closer to the 7/11 market. The beach was closer than what I expect...
unitReview.text: We stayed at the Torino. It was better than the picture. Lots of space, close to everything. One block away from the stores. even closer to the 7/11 market. The beach was closer than what I expected. It even has a place in the back yard for bar-b-ques. I was amazed by the fresh herbs, cucumbers, tomatoes and egg plants growing in the back yard with a fig tree, that we could pick. The board walk was just seconds away with gift shops and restaurants. You can catch the the trolley to go other places like, jet skiing, which we did . It was a girls trip and it was very safe to walk the board walk at night.Only we had the security code to get in, so we didn't have to worry about keeping up with keys. We had an amazing vacation. Im booking my next trip in the same condo Torino next year.

With 9 adults and 4 kids this house had plenty of room for everyone.I could sit here and go on and on about all the great things about this house and its owners but I don't want to bore you to death. So all I'm going to say is I have been renting homes up and down the coast for the past 15 years and I would definitely say this is in the top two properties I have ever rented.

hit.headline: Awesome Strategic Location Waterfront Spa Home Luxurious Yet Livable PERFECT 4

unitReview.title: A fun and unique getaway on the bay.
unitReview.snippet: My family and I very much enjoyed our stay at Absalom. My wife and our 5 children had plenty of room to spread out and had a fun time exploring this unique house (beds and bathrooms all over the ...
unitReview.text:
My family and I very much enjoyed our stay at Absalom. My wife and our 5 children had plenty of room to spread out and had a fun time exploring this unique house (beds and bathrooms all over the place!). The quiet neighborhood was a welcome change from the big city. With that said, groceries were only a mile away and great dining another mile beyond that. Also, the freshest seafood you could ask for can be had right off the dock. The raw oysters were amazing (they will shuck them for an extra $1 if you ask at the market) and you can get all the blue crab you are willing to crack.
The property was in great shape and fully stocked with everything we could possibly need, including paper products. The pool was beautiful and clean and the exterior well-cared for. Inside were the latest appliances and electronics for you to play with to your heart's content.
If you want to swim in the ocean, you will have to drive to it, as the bay is not very swimmer friendly. There's a state park 10 minutes down the road with beautiful public beach on the Chesapeake, otherwise it's a 1/2 hour to Virginia beach to hit the big surf of the Atlantic.....or you could just stay home and use the pool and the roomy Jacuzzi.
Steve was a great host and in constant communication, making sure our stay was everything he promised it would be. Would definitely come back again next time we are in Virginia. Thanks!

hit.headline: NORTHEND RESORT ACROSS THE STREET FROM THE OCEAN AND BOARDWALK ON ATLANTIC AVE

unitReview.title: ***Warning*** Word to the wise, AVOID THIS RENTAL,
unitReview.snippet:
***Warning*** Word to the wise, AVOID THIS RENTAL, you have been warned!
This place is very outdated and was never cleaned from the time when we got there. Pictures speak a thousand words. If o...
unitReview.text:
***Warning*** Word to the wise, AVOID THIS RENTAL, you have been warned!
This place is very outdated and was never cleaned from the time when we got there. Pictures speak a thousand words. If only we could post the pictures of this rental on this site to show the conditions of the place when we moved in you would heed this warning. For now, let this description serve as the thousand words;
The day we arrived, there was dust everywhere and black stuff, possibly droppings on the vent in the living room. Cob webs were hanging from the ceilings in the one room. The toilet seat and behind it was not clean the same black black stuff or droppings along the floor in the bathroom. The tub was not cleaned at all and still had soap scum in it from the previous renters. We found a baby bottle in the one bedroom room that was stuck in the back of the bed and had molded over. The air conditioner hardly worked. The AC in the kitchen leaked down the wall close to the electrical power outlet it was connected to. We had to put a towel under it to soak up with water the entire time we were there. One of the employees came to fix it but that didn’t resolve anything. Mind you the wood frame that holds the air conditioner in place from the outside is rotted. Let’s talk about an infestation of roaches, spiders and all kinds of bugs throughout the unit.
For a unit that should be able to accommodate up to 6 people, there was not enough plates, cups or silverware to accommodate the amount of people that it advertises.
What you are offered prior to arrival is NOT what you will get. We were to rent the downstairs Duplex but upon arrival we were told that we would be assigned to another unit, the upstairs duplex which was a lot smaller and not what we agreed to. While we raised our concerns to the property, out concerns went unheard and the issues unresolved. Their only solution was NOT to offer us our refund on the spot, but to mail it to us at their convenience.
There will be another review to add to this one since i was not able to get it all on one review. I will rate this a 1 since there is nothing lower than that.

hit.headline: A Wish Upon A Star: 8 BR / 8 BA house in Virginia Beach, Sleeps 20

unitReview.title: Poor to Excellent
unitReview.snippet: This a great house but poorly managed. This is a perfect house for a large family, the owner has provided a great venue. However, the place was not clean when we arrived, in particular the kitc...
unitReview.text: This a great house but poorly managed. This is a perfect house for a large family, the owner has provided a great venue. However, the place was not clean when we arrived, in particular the kitchen and dining area, but other areas as well. They brought someone over to clean, but, it was a waste of time. I sent a 2 1/2 page letter to the management company several weeks ago and they have not responded. The coffee (3) pots were so beaten up they would not work, the silverware drawer needed to be cleaned. To save time, we had to clean the place up. The dining chairs were so dirty, we did not use half of them. Finally, the ants were horrendous. While they did respond to inquiry about problems quickly, some of this could have been avoided by following a well thought out TO DO LIST, prior to arrival. I might mention that VRBO is not easy to make a complaint to either. We decided to have a great time in spite of the dirt.
